description: Buttery, flaky pastry, this easy spanakopita recipe is a great way to use up leftover greens. It's freezer-friendly and full of flavour.
name: Spanakopita Triangles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly beat remaining egg, then brush over triangles. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and bake for 30 minutes or until golden. Serve.
